Layer.OnCommand:
%function(self)
local function rgba(r,g,b,a) r=r/255 g=g/255 b=b/255 a=a
return r,g,b,a end self:zoom(1000); self:diffuse(rgba(0, 0, 0,1)); end

Layer.Name: rwave[1]
Layer.OnCommand:
%function(self)
local function rgba(r,g,b,a) r=r/255 g=g/255 b=b/255 a=a
return r,g,b,a end self:customtexturerect(0.5,0,2.5,2.0) self:texcoordvelocity(0,-.3) self:cropleft(.2) self:cropright(.2) self:zoomy(2) self:zoomx(2) self:rotationz(0) self:xy(0,0) end
